fixes.name: Delta Down USD 30Y Diff
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD 30Y] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: Direct multiplication of the two referenced calculated fields translated to DAX. All field references use the 'TableName'[Column] format as required. No additional aggregation or VARs were necessary for this simple expression.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The expression depends on the calculated field 'Date Sign', which references Tableau [Parameters]. Per the rules, any calculation that references parameters must be implemented as a measure.
